Class Library.KTD_Ptr

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library.KTD_Ptr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
    Enclosing class:
    Library

    public static class Library.KTD_Ptr
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a KinTermDef pointer (to be stored in KTD_EQCs in the ClauseIndex). It is used as a compact stand-in for a KinTermDef in set operations during learning. The slot for 'ktd' is used to cache the real KTD during construction. But when a KTD_Ptr is written to disk, the ktd is not (to conserve space); it is retrieved on demand.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
